mdBusiness.name: dss.vector.solutions.entomology.assay.EfficacyAssay
mdBusiness.label: Efficacy Assay
mdBusiness.description: An efficacy assay which can be performed on a colony mosquitos

integer.name: holdingTime
integer.label: Holding Time (hr)
integer.description: The amount of time the mosquitos were held before exposure in hours

integer.name: quantityDead
integer.label: Number Dead
integer.description: The total number of mosquitos which died during the assay

integer.name: quantityLive
integer.label: Number Alive
integer.description: The total number of mosquitos which lived during the assay

reference.name: surfacePostion
reference.label: Position on surface
reference.description: The surface position of the insecticide

integer.name: timeOnSurface
integer.label: Time on Surface (weeks)
integer.description: The length of time the Insecticide has been on the surface in weeks

struct.name: ageRange
struct.label: Age Range
struct.description: The age range of the mosquitos tested

integer.name: fed
integer.label: Number Fed
integer.description: Fed value (Only applicable when females are present).

integer.name: gravid
integer.label: Number Gravid
integer.description: Gravid value (Only applicable when females are present)

reference.name: sex
reference.label: Sex
reference.description: The sex of the tested mosquitos

mdMethod.name: getOverallMortalityRate
mdMethod.label: Get Overall Mortality Rate
mdMethod.description: Returns the overall mortality rate for all efficacy assays on the same suface and date

mdMethod.name: searchByGeoEntityAndDate
mdMethod.label: Search By GeoEntity and Date
mdMethod.description: Searches for all efficacy assays with the given geo entity and date

mdAction.name: cloneAssay
mdAction.description: Creates a new EfficacyAssay with some of the values from the given assay
mdAction.label: Clone Assay
